AccessibilityEnum.title: AccessibilityEnum
AccessibilityEnum.description: Special forms of accessibility,easements and marking for handicapped people.

Assignment.title: Assignment
Assignment.description: An assignment for a parking site or a parking space. Might be including or excluding, depending on typeOfAssignment.

typeOfAssignment.title: typeOfAssignment
typeOfAssignment.description: Defines, if this assignment is of including or excluding nature.

vehicleType.title: vehicleType
vehicleType.description: The vehicle type this assignment refers to.

fuelType.title: fuelType
fuelType.description: The type of fuel this assignment refers to.

user.title: user
user.description: A user this assignment refers to.

additionalAssignment.title: additionalAssignment
additionalAssignment.description: An additional assignment in natural language.

availableSpaces.title: availableSpaces
availableSpaces.description: The total number of currently vacant parking spaces within this site for the given assignment. (e.g. for lorries). Use only with type of assignment = 'optimised' or 'allowed'. Do not use when describing a single parking space.

AssignmentTypeEnum.title: AssignmentTypeEnum
AssignmentTypeEnum.description: Including or excluding parameters for assignments.

AvailabilityEnum.title: AvailabilityEnum
AvailabilityEnum.description: Information if a parking space is closed, available or occupied.

Coordinate.title: Coordinate
Coordinate.description: A pair of planar coordinates defining the geodetic position of a single point using the European Terrestrial Reference System 1989 (ETRS89).

latitude.title: latitude
latitude.description: Latitude in decimal degrees using the European Terrestrial Reference System 1989 (ETRS89).

longitude.title: longitude
longitude.description: Longitude in decimal degrees using the European Terrestrial Reference System 1989 (ETRS89).

Dimension.title: Dimension
Dimension.description: A component that provides dimension information. The product of width and height must not be necessarily be the square footage (e.g. in multi-storey buildings or when some zones are not part of the square footage).

orientationOfLengthAxis.title: orientationOfLengthAxis
orientationOfLengthAxis.description: The orientation of the length axis in degree. In the case of a parking space, this corresponds to the direction, in which a vehicle is parked.

usableArea.title: usableArea
usableArea.description: The area measured in square metres, that is available for some specific purpose.

locationDescriptor.title: locationDescriptor
locationDescriptor.description: Supplementary human-readable description of the location

specificAccessInformation.title: specificAccessInformation
specificAccessInformation.description: Information on one specific access (entrance or exit) in human readable text, for example the corresponding road where it is located.

level.title: level
level.description: The level of the parking space (0 = ground etc.), or the first level of the entire parking site (for example, if a parking site is located on the roof of a building).

roadNumber.title: roadNumber
roadNumber.description: The road number designated by the road authority

coordinatesForDisplay.title: coordinatesForDisplay
coordinatesForDisplay.description: Coordinates that may be used by clients for visual display on user interfaces.

ParkingOccupancyTrendEnum.title: ParkingOccupancyTrendEnum
ParkingOccupancyTrendEnum.description: List of terms used to describe the trend in parking space occupancy.

ParkingPublicationLight.title: ParkingPublicationLight
ParkingPublicationLight.description: A simplified publication to transfer parking information.

name.title: name
name.description: The name of the parking light publication.

description.title: description
description.description: A description for the parking light publication.

ParkingSite.title: ParkingSite
ParkingSite.description: A collection of parking spaces within a building, an open ground or some on street area. Usually seen as one entity and manged as such.

lastUpdate.title: lastUpdate
lastUpdate.description: Last update time of this parking site information.

description.title: description
description.description: A description for this parking site.

equipmentAndServices.title: equipmentAndServices
equipmentAndServices.description: Equipment and services available at this parking site, described in natural language.

security.title: security
security.description: Security aspects at this parking site, described in natural language.

openingTimesDescription.title: openingTimesDescription
openingTimesDescription.description: Opening times of this parking site, described in natural language.

isOpenNow.title: isOpenNow
isOpenNow.description: True, if the parking site is open right now.

temporaryClosed.title: temporaryClosed
temporaryClosed.description: True, if the parking site is closed ignoring its regular opening times, for example due to maintenance or constructions.

operatorInformation.title: operatorInformation
operatorInformation.description: Information about the operator of this parking site.

tariffDescription.title: tariffDescription
tariffDescription.description: Information about the parking-tariffs in natural language.

freeParking.title: freeParking
freeParking.description: If true, parking is free at this site.

zoneDescription.title: zoneDescription
zoneDescription.description: A description of some specific zone this parking site might belong to,

urlLinkAddress.title: urlLinkAddress
urlLinkAddress.description: A Uniform Resource Locator (URL) address pointing to a resource available on the Internet from where further relevant information may be obtained.

maximumParkingDuration.title: maximumParkingDuration
maximumParkingDuration.description: The maximum parking duration for this parking site.

numberOfSpaces.title: numberOfSpaces
numberOfSpaces.description: The total number of parking spaces at this site, not including closed spaces (due to maintenance, for example).

availableSpaces.title: availableSpaces
availableSpaces.description: The total number of currently vacant parking spaces available in the specified parking site.

occupancyTrend.title: occupancyTrend
occupancyTrend.description: The trend of the occupancy of the parking spaces in the specified parking site.

ParkingSpace.title: ParkingSpace
ParkingSpace.description: A parking space, i.e. a single slot for one vehicle. Includes dynamic information if it is available or not.

externalIdentifier.title: externalIdentifier
externalIdentifier.description: An external identifier for this parking space, e.g. "R145"

parkingSiteReference.title: parkingSiteReference
parkingSiteReference.description: A reference to a parking site this parking space belongs to.

lastUpdate.title: lastUpdate
lastUpdate.description: Point of time of the latest update of this information.

accessibility.title: accessibility
accessibility.description: Information on accessibility, easements and marking for handicapped people.

maximumParkingDuration.title: maximumParkingDuration
maximumParkingDuration.description: The maximum parking duration for this parking space.

availability.title: availability
availability.description: Information if this space is closed, available or occupied.

nextAvailableTimeSlot.title: nextAvailableTimeSlot
nextAvailableTimeSlot.description: In case there is a reservation or time management: Point of time this space will be available for usage.

UserTypeEnum.title: UserTypeEnum
UserTypeEnum.description: Types of users; used for parking but also for usage of equipment and services.
